017package org.apache.juneau.http.remote;
018
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
022
023/**
024 * Utilities.
025 */
026public class RemoteUtils {
027
028   /**
029    * Predicate that can be used with the {@link ClassInfo#getAnnotationList(Predicate)} and {@link MethodInfo#getAnnotationList(Predicate)}
030    */
031   public static final Predicate<AnnotationInfo<?>> REMOTE_OP_GROUP = x -> x.isInGroup(RemoteOp.class);
032}
